participant_1.background: i like to eat hamburgers and french fries. i like to take walks. i do not drink soda. i have a boyfriend. i live in a house.

participant_2.background: i love to cook paella. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year. i am an art major in college. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus.

content.text: Do you think I am descendent of columbus
hello, how are you today? i love walking.
no, i think you are a descendant of something else. i don't know.
